scripts.test:tutors-publish-html:coverage: cd cli/tutors-publish-html && deno test --coverage=coverage --allow-read --allow-write --allow-run --allow-env --allow-sys --allow-net && deno coverage coverage
scripts.test:tutors-publish-html:coverage:html: cd cli/tutors-publish-html && deno test --coverage=coverage --allow-read --allow-write --allow-run --allow-env --allow-sys --allow-net && deno coverage coverage --html
scripts.test:tutors-publish-html:install: npm run install:deno && npm run test:tutors-publish-html
